triples.name: DBSCAN
triples.relevance: The paper proposes performance improvements and optimizations for the DBSCAN density-based clustering algorithm.

triples.name: Cluster analysis
triples.relevance: Clustering is the core task that DBSCAN addresses and the paper evaluates.

triples.name: Data mining
triples.relevance: Data mining is identified as an important application domain for clustering technology.

triples.name: Pattern recognition
triples.relevance: Pattern recognition is cited as a key application area for clustering algorithms.

triples.name: Machine learning
triples.relevance: Machine learning is mentioned as an important field where clustering has applications.

triples.name: Artificial intelligence
triples.relevance: The paper references artificial intelligence as the broader field addressing big data processing challenges.

triples.name: Big data
triples.relevance: Big data is the motivating context for improving DBSCAN performance and scalability.
